channel.description: Follow me into the rabbit hole that is my mind and learn about topics including.. security, technology, efficiency, biohacking, health, personal growth and probably a whole lot more.

item.title: How to add a Flattr button to your Tumblr posts
item.author: devalias
item.description:
Just a quick post today. You may notice the Flattr buttons on posts now. To find out how to add them to your own Tumblr posts check out

http://manuelgrabowski.de/2012/01/03/add-an-individual-flattr-button-to-your-tumblr-posts/
